selections.name: Falcon Gold
selections.reason: Consistent performer with two placings from 7 starts. Ran a solid 2nd at this track recently on Soft 5. Sets the standard here.

selections.name: Gaelic Gem
selections.reason: Resuming. Showed ability on debut with a 2nd on Heavy going. Wet track stats are a plus.

selections.name: Pure Melody
selections.reason: Resuming. Placed on heavy ground previously. Watch for market moves.

selections.name: Brucey
selections.reason: First starter who won a trial at Goulburn. Drawn well and stable strikes at 16%.

danger_horse.name: Gaelic Gem
danger_horse.reason: Proven ability to handle wet tracks makes her a threat fresh.

selections.name: Triptolemus
selections.reason: Won well last start in BM58 grade. Improving type who handles the soft conditions and drawn perfectly.

selections.name: Cashbook
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from Highway/Cl3 company. 3rd last start was strong.

selections.name: Boomtown Chat
selections.reason: Winner at this level recently. Consistent form and maps well.

selections.name: Party Doll
selections.reason: Class runner dropping back from Provincial grade. Handles wet tracks well.

danger_horse.name: Cashbook
danger_horse.reason: Class drop is significant; major threat if he brings his best form.

selections.name: Our Little Star
selections.reason: Loves the wet (15:1-3-5 on soft). Solid 2nd last start and ready to peak.

selections.name: Shezain
selections.reason: Lightly raced winner who showed good fight to win maiden. Open to improvement.

selections.name: Jazz All Knight
selections.reason: Consistent at this track and distance. Placed last start and drawn soft.

selections.name: Straight Fire
selections.reason: Resuming. Has class on her side but giving weight away.

danger_horse.name: Shezain
danger_horse.reason: Unexposed potential could see her measure up quickly.

selections.name: Burgundy Girl
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. 3rd in BM65 last start indicates she is ready for this trip.

selections.name: Bombelleistic
selections.reason: Consistent type who placed over 2000m last start. Will stay the trip.

selections.name: Flashy Icon
selections.reason: Running on well over the mile. Step up in distance looks suitable.

selections.name: Jimmy Manolo
selections.reason: True stayer who will appreciate the 2200m test.

danger_horse.name: Bombelleistic
danger_horse.reason: Proven consistency at this level makes him a safe option.

selections.name: C'mon Wicksy
selections.reason: Placed last start and maps well from barrier 4. Handles the conditions.

selections.name: Ring Of Fire
selections.reason: Improving with racing. 3rd last start and drawn the rails.

selections.name: Belleistic Bonny
selections.reason: Solid 3rd last start. Consistent enough to feature here.

selections.name: Brundee Tom
selections.reason: Not far away last start. Place claims.

danger_horse.name: Ring Of Fire
danger_horse.reason: Inside draw gives him a tactical advantage.

selections.name: Who But Roo
selections.reason: Class runner dropping from BM72/Open company. Good form and drawn well.

selections.name: Lambay
selections.reason: Ran 2nd in the Narooma Cup. Strong form line for this.

selections.name: My Last Hooray
selections.reason: Resuming. Has excellent fresh stats and ability.

selections.name: Chasing A Quid
selections.reason: Consistent runner who is rarely far away.

danger_horse.name: Lambay
danger_horse.reason: Recent Cup form is superior to most of these.

selections.name: Zouatica
selections.reason: The class horse of the field (BM94 form). Carries weight but has the ability to dominate from the rails.

selections.name: Buillt
selections.reason: Racing in great form (2nd BM84). Wide draw is the only concern.

selections.name: Direct Fire
selections.reason: Solid 3rd in BM72 last start. Light weight gives him a chance.

selections.name: Master Riley
selections.reason: Runner up in BM72 last start. Competitive here.

danger_horse.name: Buillt
danger_horse.reason: Form is undeniable; if he overcomes the draw, he wins.

selections.name: Miss Stalwart
selections.reason: Good 2nd last start. Handles soft going (18:1-2-2). Tough draw but has ability.

selections.name: Sanzeno
selections.reason: Consistent type with a 3rd last start. Should be in the finish.

selections.name: Chebici
selections.reason: 3rd last start. Drawn well to get a soft run.

selections.name: Remadosi
selections.reason: Resuming winner. Proven fresh performer.

danger_horse.name: Sanzeno
danger_horse.reason: Consistency is key in a messy race like this.
